name: Nihilego
flavorText: One of the Ultra Beasts, it's unclear whether or not this Pokémon is sentient, but sometimes it can be observed behaving like a young girl.

attacks.name: Nightcap
attacks.text: You can use this attack only if your opponent has exactly 2 Prize cards remaining. Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon's attacks and use it as this attack.

attacks.name: Void Tentacles
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.
